string-array.name: recipe_array
string-array.item: A classic sandwich made with your choice of bread, deli meat, cheese, and fresh vegetables like lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers, finished with mustard or mayo.
Beef steak, seasoned with salt, pepper, and garlic, seared to create a crispy crust while keeping the inside tender. Served with mashed potatoes and grilled vegetables.
Spaghetti cooked al dente, topped with marinara sauce made from tomatoes, garlic, onions, and basil. Finished with parmesan cheese and garlic bread on the side.
Fish fillets battered and fried, served with thick-cut chips and a side of tartar sauce or malt vinegar.
Classic lasagna with layers of rich tomato sauce, seasoned ground beef, ricotta, and mozzarella cheese, baked until bubbly and golden.
A fresh salad made with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and vinaigrette dressing. Add grilled chicken or boiled eggs for extra protein.
Donuts with a sweet and fluffy texture, deep-fried until golden, finished with powdered sugar or glaze, and optionally filled with cream or jam.
Tacos with tortillas filled with seasoned beef or chicken, topped with lettuce, cheese, salsa, and a squeeze of lime.
Waffles cooked to golden brown in a waffle iron, served with butter, maple syrup, and fresh fruit.
Sushi rolls made with rice, nori, and fillings like fish, cucumber, and avocado. Served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.
Pancakes cooked on a griddle, served with butter and syrup or fresh fruit for a breakfast treat.
Fried chicken battered and seasoned with spices, deep-fried to a crispy golden brown, served with mashed potatoes or coleslaw.
Pizza with a thin or thick crust, topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and various toppings like pepperoni or vegetables.
Ramen noodles served in a rich broth with toppings like sliced pork, boiled egg, and green onions.
